pages.text: The $(mob)Ender Eye$() is neutral flying monster that spawns in dark places and on the surface at night in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It is immune to falling damage and web effects. Similar to the $(l:minecraft_enderman)$(mob)Enderman$(), an $(mob)Ender Eye$() is passive unless a player makes eye-contact with it, then it will immediately attack the player. As an End creature, it is vulnerable to water and teleports in combat.
$(mob)Ender Eyes$() drop $(item)Ender Pearls$() on death. These can be thrown to teleport the user where it lands, at the cost of some life.
$(mob)Ender Eyes$() drop $(item)Ore Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive a random ore found in the $(thing)Overworld$().
